mapper.select: SELECT CART_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , CART_CNT , DATE_FORMAT(CART_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CART_DATE , ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM shop_cart CART, shop_item ITEM, item_img IMG WHERE CART.ITEM_CODE = ITEM.ITEM_CODE AND CART.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE AND MEM_ID = #{memId} AND IS_MAIN = 'Y'
